Articles.Content:
Hi ! How about making a mod that adds the real versions of the trains of this video ?

I'd like for that new mod to this mod to contain the following features :

adds the cabin (with a smoking chimney (that  smokes on all levels of thrust), a smoking whistle engine (with sound) a ringing bell and a very detailled interior), wheels (with sound), tender (no tender if that's a diesel or electric locomotive) freight wagons (no freight wagons for passenger trains) and caboose of each trains that are in the video, as well as the following trains :

Best friend of charleston 0-4-0

Lafayette (From Baltimore & Ohio) 4-2-0

metropolitan railway 4-4-0

Jupiter (from central pacific) 4-4-0

N°119 (from union pacific) 4-4-0

siemens tramway

Darjeeling Himalayan Railway 0-4-0

HE2/2 (from jungfraubahn)

Snow-plow  n°193 (from large island railroad)

motrice 500 Paris subway

U-127 4-6-0

mckeen railcar

camelback class L7 4-2-1

Flying Scotsman (from LNER) 4-6-0

E-EL 2

Fliegender Hamburger (from Deutsche Reichbahn)

GG1 (from pennsylvania railroad)

California Zephyr (from Chicago Burlington and Quincy)

Super Chief (from Atchison Topeka & Santa Fe)

Hudson J3A 20th century limited 4-6-4

Class GS-4 (from southern pacific) 4-8-4

class C-38 new south wales 4-6-2

golden arrow 4-6-2

dd40 (from union pacific)

TGV PSE (from SNCF)

Palace on wheels

Shinkansen l00 series

eurostar

shanghai transrapid

and New York subway

adds some train stations, rails (basic rails and magnetic rails (for maglev trains) and tunnels all around kerbin (like kerbin side), which requires kerbal konstructs

Good luck !
There's a download link to the crafts and mods in the description. Just be warned, the lag will be ungodly unless you have something like a NASA supercomputer.
Probably because they are composed of many stock parts.

exactly, the idea is to make a mod that adds some parts to make the real version of the trains  of the video and the other trains that I have indicated, with less parts than the stock versions (with tweakscale and infernal robotics) (because it takes long time to launch the trains) and the trains would be separated in some different packs, or reunited in one pack if the user want to download them all at once (like kerbinside) :

for example, "kerbal trains steam", wich contains :

coalbrookdale 0-4-0 (from penydarren tramroad)

blucher 0-4-0

rocket 0-2-2 (from liverpool and manchester railway)

best friend of charleston 0-4-0 (from South Carolina Canal & Rail Road Co.

lafayette 4-2-0 (from Baltimore and Ohio)

firefly argus 2-2-2 (from great western railway)

metropolitan railway A class 4-4-0-T

baldwin's six whells 0-6-0

consolidation first type 2-8-0

the general 4-4-0

jupiter 4-4-0 (from central pacific)

n°119 4-4-0 (from union pacific)

stirling 4-2-2 (from great northern railway)

DHR type b (from darjeeling himalayan railway)

long island railroad rotating snow plow

U-127 4-6-0

atlantic e6 4-4-2 (modified as a 4-6-4) (from pennsylvania railroad)

camelback 4-6-0 (from central railroad of new jersey)

flying scotsman 4-6-2 (from london and north eastern railway)

northern 4-8-4 (from atchison topeka and santa fe railroad)

hudson J3A 20th century ltd 4-6-4 (from new york central)

mallard 4-6-2 (from london and north eastern railway)

challenger 4-6-6-4 (from union pacific)

big boy 4-8-8-4 (also from union pacific)

coast daylight 4-8-4 (from southern pacific)

pacific PLM 4-6-2 (from PLM)

golden arrow 4-6-2

P36 golden eagle 4-6-4 (from soviet railway)

Thomas and friends

hogwarts express 4-6-2 (from harry potter)

and santa express 0-4-0

I will tell the other packs later.
